stories.title: Russia Demands Wikipedia Take Down Information About Ukraine War

stories.text:
I like to run while listening to podcasts. I like listening to tech talks that don't require watching slides.

I'd like the content to be like the technical posts on HN.

Or even an HN front-page summary podcast each day. Does this exist?

Where can I find this content? What are you favorite pods?
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Programming Podcasts?
Report a security vulnerability as an ethical hacker
Great April's fool joke from an MLOps company (swindler detection)

stories.text: When trying to enable 2FA (2-Step Verification) for a Google Account I cannot find option to use Google Authenticator app. Only options are "Use your phone as your second step to sign in", "Security Key" and "Text message or voice call". I don't want to link my account to a phone which potentially can be lost. I don't have a hardware key either. Now what?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to enable 2FA for Google Account to use Authenticator app?
